properties.name: spring.dubbo.scan
properties.description: the package of DUBBO service , so that Spring can scan this package and new a instance

properties.name: spring.dubbo.application
properties.description: DUBBO application config. Mostly time you just need set value for <name>

properties.name: spring.dubbo.registry
properties.description: DUBBO registry config. Mostly time you just need set value for <address>, so that DUBBO can no where to registry server

properties.name: spring.dubbo.protocol
properties.description: dubbo service's protocol config. you should set value for <port>
